name: 243 6x6 Game
description:
"243 6x6 Game" is mathematical puzzle game with 6x6 grid.

How to play:

Use your arrow keys to move the tiles, or with your fingers swipe in the four directions. When three tiles with the same number touch, they can be summed up in one.

Modes:

You can play the game in four modes, which means four difficulty levels.

Easy Mode: You have to reach the 81 tile which means you have to join three tiles with number 27 together. This mode is so easy and you have to finish it with no suffer.

Medium Mode: This mode is kinda needs some attention, you have to reach the tile 243, which means you have to join three tiles with number 81 together.

Hard Mode: This mode is hard but you can do it if you stay calm and play carefully, you have to reach the tile 729, which means you have to join three tiles with number 243 together.

Brutal Mode: You are a genius if you can do it!!! You have to reach the tile 2187, which means you have to join three tiles with number 729 together.
